title: MAFS star Susie Bradley posts more racy selfies amid split from Todd Carney
text:
Married At First Sight star Susie Bradley, 27, is back on the market after splitting with NRL bad boy, Todd Carney, 33.

The blonde beauty has already cleansed her social media profile of her ex-boyfriend, and is now back to sharing racy photos as a newly-single woman.

Flaunting her ample assets and taut stomach online, the reality TV star is no doubt showing Todd what he's missing after their shock split.

Single and ready to mingle! MAFS star Susie Bradley has ditched her modest relationship look and gone back to flaunting her extreme cleavage in selfies following split from Todd Carney

The pair dated for eight months, when without warning they unfollowed each other on social media and deleted every documented photo together over the weekend.

Susie confirmed her split from the Cronulla Sharks star this week, claiming she was 'throwing myself into work' because 'it's been a bit s**t'.

However, she hinted she was keen to meet new people, saying in a recent video: 'I really, really, really love meeting people, talking about their lives, talking about my life and making friends. Making friends is like my favourite thing to do.'

'Sorry not sorry': Susie shared this glamorous photo of herself following the couple's split

If you've got it! In one photo, in which Susie flaunts her abs, a comment underneath reads '100% a fish for comments if ever I saw one', to which Susie cheekily responded: 'Yep I'd say so'

Since the split, Susie has dared to bare in skimpier outfits on social media.

During her relationship with Todd, the star opted for a mostly-modest look and rarely shared photos flaunting her figure without Todd present.

In one recent photo, a comment read '100% a fish for comments if ever I saw one', to which Susie cheekily responded: 'Yep I'd say so.'

It's over! Susie has unfollowed and deleted all couple photos with NRL bad boy Todd after eight months of dating

Despite only last month pledging their undying love for one another, the pair parted ways this month.

On Saturday night, Todd hit the town with his friends during a boys' night.

The sportsman shared a story with Pharrell Williams' Happy playing, writing: 'Boys are on!'

Meanwhile, Susie also shared a night with friends drinking wine, and shared the image: 'Wine won't wake up one day and leave you.'

'Because I'm happy': On Saturday night, Todd hit the town on a boys' night

Ouch! Susie also shared a night with friends drinking wine and wrote alongside the image: 'Wine won't wake up one day and leave you'

Keep them coming! Susie shared videos drinking at home with friends on a girls' night in after deleting all remnants of Todd from her social media pages

Over the last eight months, Todd has become a committed stepfather to Susie's four-year-old daughter, Baby, from a previous relationship.

'She has her own father, but when Baby's in my care, I treat her as if she's my own,' Todd said to New Idea in September.

He even recently admitted he's ready to start a family: 'If Susie and I are ready to commit to it, I'd definitely love to have kids.'

'I'd love to have kids with her!' NRL bad boy Todd only recently revealed he was planning a family with his Married At First Sight star girlfriend Susie

Step-father: Susie, 26, has a three-year-old daughter from a previous relationship named Baby

The couple celebrated their six-month anniversary in August, which Susie commemorated with a heartfelt Instagram post.

She wrote at the time: 'We have laughed, we have cried, we have battled relentlessly with attention, both positive and negative, we have had our names tattooed, we've been on an overseas holiday, we have grown in love each day, learning as a new family of three.'

Daily Mail Australia have contacted Susie Bradley and Todd Carney for comment.

Dedicated: 'She has her own father, but when Baby's in my care, I treat her as if she's my own,' Todd told New Idea on Monday

A very modern romance! The couple first met in January, after Todd 'slid into Susie's DMs' on Instagram following weeks of liking each other's photos

The couple first met in January, after Todd 'slid into Susie's DMs' on Instagram following weeks of liking each other's photos.

Susie, who was partnered with barista Billy Vincent on Married At First Sight, went 'Instagram official' with Todd in March.

She received a significant backlash when the pair first began dating, as MAFS fans thought that Susie was being unfaithful to Billy.

Of course, MAFS is actually filmed months in advance and Susie had long since broken things off with Billy when she began dating Todd.
description: Married At First Sight star Susie Bradley, 27, is back on the market after splitting with NRL bad boy Todd Carney, 33.
